item.description:
Please note:  There is a charge of $12 to attend. We'll practice some of the Qigong that Master Zhang teaches. Could include Wind Water Qigong, Fire Dragon and/or Pyramid Meditation, but exactly what we practice will depend in part on who comes. It's fine for beginners. Mostly it will be practice with some explanation, but there will be ongoing classes after this for those who are interested. Are you ready to jump in?


Here's a Google Map -

http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&hl=en&saddr=&daddr=34+Hillside+Rd%2C+Watertown%2C+MA+02472%2C+us
item.how_to_find_us: Hillside Road is off Mt. Auburn St in Watertown. By bus, take the #71 bus from Harvard Sq., get off at Upland Rd. Walk along Mt. Auburn for 1 long block & turn right onto Hillside. #34 is at the top of the hill on the left; the blue door on the left.
item.why: By improving the energy and flow of energy throughout the body, we improve our health.
item.name: Qigong Practice Group with Master Zhang 7:30-8:30pm
